author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Zhejiang Jiaxin Silk to pay cash dividend of 1.8 yuan per 10 shares (before tax) on April 19
text:
April 12 (Reuters) - Zhejiang Jiaxin Silk Corp Ltd
* Says it will pay a cash dividend of 1.8 yuan per 10 shares (before tax) for 2017 to shareholders of record on April 18
* The companyâ€™s shares will be traded ex-right and ex-dividend on April 19 and the dividend will be paid on April 19
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/85TMC8
